website_summaries.verdict: This flat plug-in model can provide up to 1/2 acre of outdoor bug protection.
pros: The outer enclosure is made of durable plastic that protects kids and pets while luring in bugs
Plug-in support means no worries about batteries
cons: It may not be as effective against very large flying insects

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing! Hasn't caught even one!
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't caught even one bug! Not even one! I think I should have bought one of the ones that have a suction fan, they might work better, not sure... but this thing is just going into trash, totally useless. Don't waste your money, I should have listened to the real reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Max H.

customer_reviews.title: Great light to kill some bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. I have it on the counter in my kitchen to kill fruit flys that are around cause our garden vegetables and the fresh fruits. It's not to big, not to bright. It's silent, which is nice, no Humm like some lights I remember from years ago. Even in the dark it's not too bright to be annoying when left on.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: This bug zapper is a must!
customer_reviews.text: This Mosquito Zapper is working great for us in Upstate, NY. I have used it 2 times so far, and it's doing what it's designed to do...kill mosquitoes and other annoying bugs. The black light is bright and the unit is silent. Works well without any additional noises for operation.I have it set on the table, that turns it on from 8:30 PM until 1:00 AM and I mounted it on the corner of my deck. For only 4 1/2 hrs, I got a lot of mosquito carcasses in that little box. Then, I clean them with a small brush. Don't hesitate to buy this. This bug zapper is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mosquito zapper. i live in Alabama where the mosquito's are very bad. i plugged it up and immediately noticed the difference. i am ecstatic that i decided on this product . i do recommend this product to anyone who is wishing to get rid of mosquito's. Bama Mike
customer_reviews.author: Bama Mike

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of fruit flies!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up towards the tail end of summer. Living with messy roommates meant we had a lot of fruit flies and I eventually got sick of them (and my roommates so I moved). I still have the device, but I put this in the kitchen and it helped with the flies. It's good for personal use indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Annsley Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that works as advertised. I put the bug zapper in my kitchen, just plug in and it will starst to work! After two days there were fewer fruit flies in the kitchen.I can see many died flies are in the bug zapper. I would not hesitate to recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Parry

customer_reviews.title: Kills a lot of mosquitos every night
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use it around our house during the summer mosquito season. The mosquito is attracted by its light and enters the mosquito lamp. Then you can smell the burning mosquito. It kills a lot of mosquitoes every night . Overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast Amazing product right now I am having mosquito problems and this helps so much I definitely recommend this product it’s absolutely amazing customer service was amazing
customer_reviews.author: Allanat

customer_reviews.title: Totally useless.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all. After a few months and a huge drain fly and fruit fly problem, these did not kill a single flying insect. If I could give it less than one star, I would!
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Budz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 12x24 deck
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of it. We bought it for our deck outside and works great. Would recommend it for sure, the price very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Swimfanmom1

customer_reviews.title: Great for inside and outside
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I loved this bug zapper. It has really helped us out because we always get masquitos inside our house so we always please it in our living room so we have protection. We highly recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: Home Clean Home

product_meta.title: COMLIFE Electric Bug Zapper Indoor - UV Mosquito Killer, Fly Insects Zapper Catcher, Chemical Free, for Home, Office, Patio, Yard and Camping Outdoor
product_meta.description:
Use COMLIFE Bug Zapper, say farewell to all the annoying flying insects.

The mosquito killer lures insects through 365 nm wavelength ultraviolet, which has been scientifically proven to be highly attractive to insects, and kill the light-sensitive flying insects by electrically charged metal grid quietly and instantly. Unlike pesticides and dangerous chemicals, the whole physical process is much safer and cleaner. Create a safe and comfy home with our Electric Bug Zapper.

Note:
1.Check the local voltage before running to make sure yours is suitable for the fly killer.
2.Never remove any part of the appliance to make any internal adjustment avoiding electric shock.
3.Unplug the bug zapper before cleaning, don’t flush it, no placing in the rain.
4.In use, please close the window & door, turn off the lights in your room, and keep the bug zapper on for whole night.

Package Included:
1*COMLIFE Bug Zapper
1* User Manual
1* Cleaning brush(in the box)

Just click”Add To Cart” and get the electric bug zapper.
feature_bullets: Features 365 nm UV light, the bug zapper attracts all insects into the device, then instantly killing the insects by an extremely powerful high voltage electrically charged metal grid . Get rid of all annoying flying insects and mosquito!
Get rid of pesticides and other dangerous chemicals. This Mosquito Killer provides a comfortable and safe environment, no radiation and harmless to human bodies and pets.

This mosquito killer lamp provides a 360 degree all-directional protection, being effective for a large area of up to 538 Sq.Ft. Perfectly for home, kitchen, office, backyard, or for commercial and industrial use.

The mosquito killer features a hanging ring and outer enclosure, prevents children, pets, birds and wildlife from contacting the electric grid and avoid accidents. It can be hanging in a high place or just free standing.
